subscriptions.title: Subscription
subscriptions.downgradePending: Downgrade will take effect at the end of billing cycle
subscriptions.cancelConfirm: Are you sure you want to cancel your subscription?
subscriptions.noActiveSubscriptionDescription: You don't have an active subscription. Choose a plan to get started.
subscriptions.manageSubscription: Manage your subscription plan and billing
subscriptions.cancelConfirmWithDate: Are you sure you want to cancel your subscription? You'll continue to have access until the end of your current billing period on {{date}}.
subscriptions.cancelReasonLabel: Help us improve - Why are you cancelling? (Optional)

plansPage.title: Choose Your Plan
plansPage.subtitle: Select the perfect plan for your restaurant business
plansPage.noPlans: No subscription plans available at the moment.
plansPage.redirectToPayment: You'll be redirected to payment after confirming
plansPage.toChangePlan: To change your plan, visit the subscription management page
plansPage.faqChangePlansAnswer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time from the subscription management page.
plansPage.faqPaymentMethods: What payment methods do you accept?
plansPage.faqPaymentMethodsAnswer: We accept all major credit cards through Stripe and also support local payment methods via Iyzico.
plansPage.faqCancelAnytimeAnswer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. You'll continue to have access until the end of your billing period.
plansPage.faqFreeTrialAnswer: Yes, most paid plans include a 14-day free trial. You won't be charged until the trial period ends.

scheduledDowngrade.title: Scheduled Plan Change
scheduledDowngrade.description: You have a scheduled plan downgrade. Cancel it first if you want to make another change.
scheduledDowngrade.cancelConfirm: Are you sure you want to cancel this scheduled downgrade? You will keep your current plan.

payment.securePaymentDescStripe: Your payment information is securely processed by Stripe. Your card details are not stored by us.
payment.securePaymentDescPaytr: Your payment information is securely processed by PayTR. Your card details are not stored by us.
payment.subscriptionActivated: Your subscription has been successfully activated.

failed.title: Payment Failed
failed.description: The payment could not be completed. This may have been caused by the following reasons:
failed.insufficientBalance: Your card may have insufficient balance
failed.bankRejected: Your bank may have rejected the transaction
failed.contactSupport: If the problem persists, contact support

success.title: Payment Successful!
success.planChangeComplete: Your plan change was completed successfully. Your new plan is now active.
success.subscriptionActive: Your subscription has been successfully activated. You now have access to all features.
